name: Inky-Apps
overview:
Inky-Apps! Is one of the first Android mobile app web stores dedicated to the developing and distributing of android mobile apps that target the African American mobile Market.

Founded by Richard Fields Jr former Sen. Network Analyst for HP and a long time silicon valley tech vet states that African Americans usage of mobile technology exceeds most other ethnic groups here in America. A recent study conducted by the Solutions Research Group states that African Americans and Hispanics are leading the mobile culture when it comes to texting and downloading ringtones. However, Inky-Apps goal is to expand their mobile habits to the burgeoning mobile apps market.

Although the site was launched May of this year, inky-apps is beginning to generate the kind of traffic that is sure to make it a great success. Stop by and pay it a visit at www.inky-apps.com. The goal is to make it a million dollar company in 5 years or sooner.
